tuv.seg: Crawford Art Gallery is located in the former Customs House in Cork city
Tá Áiléar Crawford lonnaithe in Iar-Theach an Chustaim i gCathair Chorcaí
Its art collection was originally formed in 1819
Cuireadh a bhailiúchán ealaíne le chéile i dtús báire in 1819
In 2006 the Gallery was designated a National Cultural Institution
Sannadh an Dánlann mar Institiúid Chultúrtha Náisiúnta in 2006
The Gallery´s permanent collection comprises over 2000 works, ranging from eighteenth century Irish and European painting and sculpture, through to contemporary video installations
I measc bhailiúchán buan na Dánlainne tá breis agus 2,000 saothar, idir phéintéireacht agus dealbhóireacht Éireannach agus Eorpach ón ochtú haois déag aniar chuig suiteálacha comhaimseartha fístéipe
The collection is particularly strong in Irish art of the 19th and early 20th centuries
Tá dalladh ealaíne Éireannaí sa bhailiúchán den 19ú agus den 20ú haois
Information on the collection is available on the Gallery’s website
Tá faisnéis faoin mbailiúchán ar láithreán gréasáin na Dánlanna
The Gallery provides tours for schools and community groups
Cuireann an Dánlann turais ar fáil do scoileanna agus do ghrúpaí pobail
Through its education programme it also provides workshops, classes and other events for children and adults, as well as resources for teachers
Trína clár oideachais, cuireann sí ceardlanna, ranganna agus imeachtaí eile ar fáil do leanaí agus do dhaoine fásta, mar aon le hacmhainní do mhúinteoirí
Further information on its education programme is available here
Tá fáil ar thuilleadh faisnéise faoin clár oideachais anseo
In general, the Gallery is open on Monday to Saturday from 10.00am to 5.00pm and on Thursday from 10.00am to 8.00pm
Go ginearálta, bíonn an Dánlann ar oscailt ó Luan go Satharn idir 10.00r.n. agus 5.00i.n. agus ar an Déardaoin idir 10.00r.n. agus 8.00i.n
It is closed on Sunday
Tá sí dúnta ar an Domhnach
Admission to the Gallery and to exhibitions is free
Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas?
